items.title: Define catalog entry schema
items.description: Create the data schema for catalog entries with exactly four attributes: name (string), description (one plain-language sentence), inCurrentStack (boolean), pressureTested (boolean).

items.title: Create catalog data storage
items.description: Implement storage mechanism for catalog entries. Start simple (JSON file or in-memory) with a clear interface for future migration.

items.title: Add new catalog entry
items.description: Implement functionality to add a new entry to the catalog with all four required attributes.

items.title: List all catalog entries
items.description: Implement functionality to view/browse all entries in the catalog.

items.title: Lookup entry by name
items.description: Implement exact-match lookup by name to answer 'What is this?' queries. This is the core success criteria for v0.

items.title: Search entries by partial name
items.description: Implement fuzzy/partial name search for when users don't remember the exact name of a tool or term.

items.title: Seed catalog with initial entries
items.description: Populate the catalog with an initial set of commonly encountered AI tools and terms to make it immediately useful.

items.title: Filter entries by stack status
items.description: Allow filtering catalog entries by inCurrentStack or pressureTested status to see personal usage patterns.

items.title: Export catalog data
items.description: Allow exporting the catalog in a portable format (JSON, CSV) for sharing or backup.
